notesStmt.note: Title supplied by cataloger (viewed on September 17, 2015)
Written on khoi paper; manuscript originally folded concertina- or accordion-style, but this fragment of one folio is stored flat.
Written and painted in Thailand in the late 19th century (Justin McDaniel).
Dimensions of original manuscript: 28.3 x 24 cm.

msContents.summary: Illumination cut from a folio of a Thai manuscript, showing farmers working and children playing by a river. The scene also includes water buffalo, fish, birds, two buildings, and a forest background. On the verso is text from the Phra Malai.

history.provenance: Gift of the Estate of Elizabeth Lyons, Keeper of the Asian Collections, University Museum, 1989.
